name: Ida Nowakowska
introduction: She graduated from the Secondary School of Ballet. R. Turczynowicz in Warsaw [1]. Previously, she taught in a school of art in New York. She was among other student Leslie Browne and Matt Williams. Soloist Musical Theatre Roma, Warsaw, which appeared in the musicals Peter Pan, Dance of the Vampires, Cats and Phantom of the Opera. She was an actress and dancer of the theater capital of Janusz Jozefowicz Studio Buffo. She has participated in musicals Metro and Romeo and Juliet. She danced in New York at the Metropolitan Opera in "La Bayadere" and Lincoln Center, the main role in the musical "Reel to Real" [1]. She played a major role in the movie Out of Reach at the side of Steven Seagal. She took part in the final edition of the You Can Dance - Just Dance, where she took 9th place. He currently plays the role of Meg Giry in the musical "Phantom of the Opera" at the Musical Theatre Roma. In 2007 took place in the category of contemporary dance at the National Dance Competition in Gdansk, and in 2009 at the same competition she won third place. He also won the Polish Cup in Disco Dance, and took place in the International Tap Dance Competition. In April 2009 she won first prize at the festival ballet "Gold Points" in Szczecin. From 6 September 2008, led the "Dressing Room" on Channel ZigZap.
